name: prim.sh
description: Zero install. One curl. Infinite primitives.

primitives.name: wallet.sh
primitives.description: Agent wallets. Generate keys, hold USDC on Base, and pay any x402 invoice.

primitives.name: faucet.sh
primitives.description: Free testnet USDC and ETH on demand. Fund your agent wallet and start building.

primitives.name: gate.sh
primitives.description: Access control and onboarding for agents. Invite codes, allowlisting, wallet funding.

primitives.name: store.sh
primitives.description: Object storage. Persist artifacts across ephemeral VMs. S3-compatible.

primitives.name: search.sh
primitives.description: Search for agents. No ads, no SEO spam. Just facts and clean markdown.

primitives.name: feedback.sh
primitives.description: Report bugs, friction, and feature requests. Free. Every prim surfaces the feedback URL.
